summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4468 for the improvement of Crockett Street, from Bigelow Avenue North to 5th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52636, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
